bibl.title: How Fast is Fast? Technology, Trade and Speed under Sail in the Roman Red Sea.
bibl.note: Roman Red Sea trade. - The Red Sea wind regime. - The northerly wind and the location of ports. - Roman sailing ships on the Red Sea. - Seasonal currents in the Red Sea. - Discussion. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Natural Resources and Cultural Connections of the Red Sea. Proceedings of Red Sea Project III Held in the British Museum, October 2006

bibl.seg: Julian Whitewright, How Fast is Fast? Technology, Trade and Speed under Sail in the Roman Red Sea.

Janet Starkey, Paul Starkey & Tony Wilkinson (edd.), Natural Resources and Cultural Connections of the Red Sea. Proceedings of Red Sea Project III Held in the British Museum, October 2006 = Society for Arabian Studies Monographs. 5 = BAR International Series. 1661 (Oxford, 2007) pp. 77-87.
Roman Red Sea trade. - The Red Sea wind regime. - The northerly wind and the location of ports. - Roman sailing ships on the Red Sea. - Seasonal currents in the Red Sea. - Discussion. - Conclusion.
